items.question: Does Nano Smart Paste technology really work?
items.answer: Yes, it has been developed as a world first after years of work. Our products are certified by international quality institutes.

items.question: Which surfaces can it be applied to?
items.answer: Thanks to its thin and flexible structure, it can be easily applied to different surfaces in any shape, color, design and form you want. It provides high efficiency even on flexible and wavy surfaces.

items.question: Does it only work with the sun?
items.answer: No, while classic panels only need the sun, daylight is sufficient for nano paste. Electricity generation is possible with any light source.

items.question: How many degrees can it heat up?
items.answer: Surfaces covered with nano paste can heat up to 600 degrees within seconds and can be managed with digital control.

items.question: What is the energy storage capacity?
items.answer: It offers a durable energy storage system up to 500,000 charge cycles. It charges quickly and lasts long.

items.question: What is Xencoa?
items.answer: Xencoa is a visionary initiative that brings this revolutionary technology to Turkey, combining Nano Technology, Network Marketing and the Crypto world.
